BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: ST PAUL ACADEMY AND SUMMIT SCHOOL

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE STUDENTS WITH EDUCATIONAL INSTRUCTION.
IRS990.MissionDesc: ST. PAUL ACADEMY AND SUMMIT SCHOOL (SPA) IS AN INDEPENDENT COLLEGE PREPARATORY SCHOOL SERVING STUDENTS IN KINDERGARTEN THROUGH GRADE 12 FROM SAINT PAUL, MINNEAPOLIS, AND SURROUNDING COMMUNITIES. SPA GENERATES REVENUE FROM A VARIETY OF SOURCES TO CONDUCT ITS PROGRAM AND SUPPORTING SERVICES, INCLUDING TUITION, FEES, CONTRIBUTIONS, AUXILIARY ENTERPRISES, AND INVESTMENT INCOME.
IRS990.Desc: ST. PAUL ACADEMY IS AN INSTRUCTIONAL INSTITUTION FOR STUDENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S ENDOWMENT FUND WAS ESTABLISHED WITH DONOR RESTRICTED CONTRIBUTIONS TO SUPPORT OPERATIONS, BUILDING AND GROUNDS, FACULTY DEVELOPMENT, INSTRUCTIONAL PROGRAM, AND SCHOLARSHIPS.
SPA IS NOT CURRENTLY UNDER EXAMINATION BY ANY TAXING JURISDICTION. FEDERAL AND STATE TAX AUTHORITIES GENERALLY HAVE THE RIGHT TO EXAMINE RETURNS FOR A PERIOD OF THREE YEARS AFTER THEY ARE FILED.
FINANCIAL AID DEDUCTED FROM TUITION AND FEES ON FINANCIAL STATEMENTS -4,252,007. MANAGEMENT FEES DEDUCTED FROM INVESTMENT INCOME ON FINANCIAL STATEMENTS -330,663.
FINANCIAL AID DEDUCTED FROM TUITION AND FEES ON FINANCIAL STATEMENTS 4,252,007. MANAGEMENT FEES DEDUCTED FROM INVESTMENT INCOME ON FINANCIAL STATEMENTS 330,663.
THE BOARD RESOLUTIONS, DIVERSITY ACTION PLAN AND LOCAL AFFILIATIONS OF THE ORGANIZATION ARE POSTED ON ITS WEBSITE.
THE SCHOOL PROVIDES FINANCIAL AID TO STUDENTS WHO QUALIFY TO RECEIVE AID. THE SCHOOL PROVIDES EMPLOYEE DISCOUNTS TO ELIGIBLE FACULTY OR STAFF.
HOUSING ALLOWANCE IS PART OF NEGOTIATED CONTRACT. HEALTH/SOCIAL CLUB DUES ARE BILLED DIRECTLY TO SCHOOL.
ISSUER NAME: CITY OF FALCON HEIGHTS, MN DATE THE REBATE COMPUTATION WAS PERFORMED: 07/31/2018 ISSUER NAME: CITY OF LITTLE CANADA, MN DATE THE REBATE COMPUTATION WAS PERFORMED: 07/31/2018
STOCK CONTRIBUTIONS ARE PROCESSED AND SOLD THROUGH LICENSED BROKERAGE SERVICE COMPANIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 4
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CHANGES WERE MADE TO THE ARTICLES AND BYLAWS WHICH INCLUDE THE NAME OF THE ORGANIZATION, CHANGES TO THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES NUMBER, QUALIFICATIONS, TERM IN OFFICE, METHOD OF ELECTION, POWERS AND AUTHORITIES AND DUTIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FOR EXPEDIENCY, THE 990 IS REVIEWED FOR ACCURACY BY THE DIRECTOR OF FINANCE AND THE HEAD OF SCHOOL, BEFORE FILING. THE 990 IS MADE AVAILABLE TO ALL MEMBERS OF THE BOARD FOLLOWING THE REVIEW.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BOARD MEMBERS AND OFFICERS ARE REQUIRED TO COMPLETE A CONFLICT OF INTEREST QUESTIONNAIRE ON A YEARLY BASIS. THE SCHOOL HAS IMPLEMENTED A QUESTIONNAIRE THAT SPECIFICALLY REQUIRES BOARD MEMBERS AND OFFICERS TO DISCLOSE BUSINESS INTERESTS TO ENSURE POSSIBLE CONFLICTS CAN BE READILY IDENTIFIED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: INDEX SURVEY, NAIS SURVEY, INDEPENDENT SALARY CONSULTANT, WERE USED FOR SALARY RANGES. WRITTEN EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT OFFERED AFTER BOARD APPROVAL. INDEX SURVEY, NAIS SURVEY CONSULTED FOR SALARY RANGES. WRITTEN EMPLOYMENT OFFER PRESENTED TO OFFICER FROM HEAD OF SCHOOL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
